channel.title: Studio :: C# Web Development
channel.description: Counting Characters In this studio, you will write a program to count the number of times each character occurs in a string and then print the results to the console Getting Started Create your own project from scratch. Review Creating a C# Project if you need to. Some Items to Ponder Before Coding There are multiple ways to approach this task, but one way involves the following steps: Loop through the string one character at a time, Store and/or update the count for a given character using an appropriate data structure.
